import React from 'react' import {Container ,Row ,Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import logo from "../images/logo.png" import "../index.css" export default function NavBar({ search }) { const onSearch = (word) => { search(word) } return (
onSearch(e.target.value)}type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="ابحث"/>
); }
